New Records: Sunil Chhetri is set to play his final international match for India against Kuwait, with 94 goals and 150 appearances for the national team
Key Match Events: The match is significant as a potential World Cup qualifier and Chhetri's farewell game
Pre-Game Insights: The match is held at the Salt Lake Stadium, a venue with historical significance for India's football team
Post-Match Reflections: A win would help India advance in the World Cup qualifiers and serve as a fitting farewell for Chhetri
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be live-streamed on JioCinema and can be watched on Sports18 Network
